fields.headline: The empty quarter
fields.bodyText: Privileged view What's the truth about holidaying in Muslim countries right now? Jonathan Glancey opens our special report in Jordan To boldly go If you've always wanted to see the temples and tombs of Luxor or have a taste of the Spice Market in Istanbul, don't be put off. Roger Bray reports Friends in ancient places Mary Russell enjoys the traditional hospitality of the old Arab city of Damascus Medina dates Tourists may be scarce, but north Africa is still the wild, kaleidoscopic, beautiful maelstrom it always was. Andrew Gilchrist gets happily lost The view from the other twin towers Andy Pietrasik finds Malaysia and Indonesia to be tolerant and safe
